# **Tender for the Supply and Delivery of Automotive Fuel, Diesel Fuel and Heating Fuel**
### Details
**Reference Number:** WS4392232480-Doc4392250120
**Publication Date:** January 12, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2024, 2:00 PM (local time)

### Brief Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contract for the supply and delivery of automotive fuel, diesel fuel, and heating fuel to various RCMP detachments located in Northern Manitoba. All deliveries are to be made via the Winter Road period by March 31, 2024.

### Fuel Specifications
Detailed fuel specifications, mandatory requirements, and delivery logistics are available in the solicitation document.

### Tender Evaluation
Tender evaluation will be based on the lowest price submitted.

### Additional Information
* This procurement is governed by the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* Deliveries will be made to the RCMP detachments in Northern Manitoba.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Contact information for this procurement can be found below.

### Contact Information
* Ann Lacelle (SPAC/PSPC)
* ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Access to Documents
Documents related to this tender can be found on [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18501771?extsite=MTg1MDE3NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18501771?extsite=MTg1MDE3NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
